Michael Stack wrote:
> Thank you for the patch Frank. Let me apply it post-release.
> St.Ack

If you do apply it after 1.10.0 is released, you may want to at least 
fix the nohead problem so it's not broken in 1.10.0.  A simple fix is to add

if (format.equals(NOHEAD)) {
   parse = true;
}

to line 695 in ARCReader.java, right before

arc.setParseHttpHeaders(parse);


Thanks,
Frank
